attributes.action: Vote of NO CONFIDENCE in our government following result of the EU referendum.
attributes.additional_details: Following the result of the EU referendum the UK now faces an extremely turbulent time. The Prime Minister has resigned and there doesn't appear to be a credible successor fit to face the unprecendented challenges ahead. This is a time when we need strong and clear leadership. We demand that the U.K. must now hold a general election by the end of 2016 to decide our leaders for the very difficult and challenging times ahead.
attributes.background: Our government have gambled our country's future and security and lost. We now face a time when we need strong leadership to oversee the complex legal situation and monumental change afoot. We demand a UK general election by the end of 2016 as our government are clearly not fit for this purpose.
